s_synopsis: Space Quest is a series of comedy adventure games set in a sci-fi environment and feature the reluctant hero Roger Wilco, a janitor who initially works on one of the space stations and repeatedly saves the galaxy (often by accident), following his motto "for truth, justice, and really clean floors".

ao_games.s_title: Space Quest 6 - Roger Wilco in The Spinal Frontier
Space Quest III - The Pirates of Pestulon
Space Quest - Chapter II - Vohaul's Revenge
Space Quest - Chapter I - The Sarien Encounter
